attributes.action: Stop the decimation of Oldham Council's Library Service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Oldham Council has decided to close 2  libraries this year - Stoneleigh and the Mobile Library - coming after the closure of other libraries - Alt, and Delph. Further consideration may given to the closure of Broadway Library. Of particular concern is the decision to close the Mobile Library, used by many elderly people who wouldn't get to a library if there was no Mobile Library.
